issue.title: Fix input root creation for path mapped workers

labels.name: team-Local-Exec
labels.description: Issues and PRs for the Execution (Local) team

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
The set of worker files wasn't path mapped, which resulted in build failures when using a generated multiplex worker.

Fixes #23990
